*Teltoli runs into the room where Iron Raptor was, plunking all the weapons down. She also empties out the several guns in her compartment, taking care to pick up something that looked big and dangerous for herself. She smiles in satisfaction..*

"Where've the rest o' the Maximals gone? Are they still fighting the Predacons?"

------Original Message------
From: "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@...>
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
Sent: May 6, 2000 6:31:46 AM GMT
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


( Sorry I'm late, was over at a family member's house.)

* Iron Raptor snarled as she entered into the bridge at a dead run, if there 
were any Predacons in her way then they would simply be run over!
She ran up to the damaged island controls and looked them over, she growled 
as she tried to move a damaged circuit board but was shocked by a small 
power surge.
Iron Raptor calmy waited for Teltoli to bring up the weapons to the bridge, 
when she got there she would then contact the remainder of the Maximals to 
pick up the weapons...regardless if the Predacons were retreating or not!
It was time for them to fight back with a vengeance and pure hatred!
It was time to stop defending and start attacking, with high powered 
weaponry!
It was time to kick some Pred butt!*

___________________________________________________________

* Zyber followed Rowdy Wolf towards his den, the sun had gone down and it 
had become dark now. The stars were shining and the moon was up, it was a 
beautiful night.*
